content.rendered:
Community Sharing
Salesforce User Groups – Seattle Women in TechDecember 14, 2019


Overeview

Review the Profiles and Licenses differences in Communities as well as the differences in Sharing for Communities that are not available internal Salesforce.  Such as Sharing Sets, Account Relationships, Channel Programs, Apex Sharing.Learn what Sharing Sets, Account Relationships, Channel Programs, and Apex Sharing are for community cloud, how to set them up, who can use them, why to use them and more in the December Seattle WIT Webinar

The Presenters



Meighan Brodkey

Meighan is a technical architect and the leader of the Seattle Women in Tech User Group leader. With over 300 Trailhead badges, Meighan is continuously working on increasing her Salesforce knowledge and helping others do so as well. She has spoken around the world about Salesforce. Her presentations include Dreamforce 17, Surf Force 17, and the Chicago World Tour. Sharing her love of the platform with the Ohana is her passion. Over the past decade Meighan has gone from admin to architect, thanks in part to all of the knowledge shared by and help from other members of the community. She gives back to the community via Twitter, the Trailblazer Community and her blog.Twitter: @meighanSF

Read More

Resources


YouTube Video



View Session


Deck

Community Cloud Sharing – Salesforce Security from Meighan Brodkey

View Deck



Sharing Sets Post

Learn about sharing sets in the first post in my community cloud sharing.

Read More
